pros: Good Benefits, I had the weekends off and it was a stay at home position.
cons: There were a few ladies that I truly enjoyed getting to know for the short time period I was there. Unfortunately the lack of help I had at times were too overwhelming for me. pros: Community engagement, positive impact, and meaningful work

pros: No weekends, work is easy in my department which is jolts

pros: The company has a genuine interest in people and helping them to become solution-oriented through the life coaching they provide.  Innovative custom one-on-one coaching and also group coaching!
cons: I can't think of any!  The management really cares about the individual coaches' needs and input.

A feeling of doing good in the community

job_title: Program Assistant of Leadership Programs in Glens Falls, NY
pros:
The owner is Christian so has great core values she conducts the business with.
The owner is a Life Coach that is John Maxwell certified in Leadership coaching.
cons: I really can't think of any except maybe that the owner doesn't always arrive on time for appointments :)
